translations.footer.description: Since 1889, preserving Italian culture and building community in Miramar. A legacy of tradition, solidarity, and future.
translations.home.title: Welcome to the Italian Circle Joven Italia
translations.home.subtitle: Uniting generations, celebrating our Italian heritage in Miramar since 1889.
translations.home.metaDescription: Official website of the Italian Circle Joven Italia of Miramar. Events, culture, Italian language, and community.
translations.services.title: Our Services
translations.services.description: Discover everything the Italian Circle of Miramar has to offer you and your family.
translations.services.languages.title: Languages
translations.services.languages.desc: Learn Italian and English with our different levels and proposals for all ages.
translations.services.halls.title: Halls
translations.services.halls.desc: Equipped and versatile spaces for your meetings, trainings, and celebrations.
translations.services.citizenship.title: Citizenship
translations.services.citizenship.desc: Comprehensive advice and support in the procedures to obtain Italian citizenship.
translations.services.culture.title: Culture and Art
translations.services.culture.desc: Exhibitions, music, and events that promote our cultural heritage.
translations.services.dance.title: School of Dance
translations.services.dance.desc: Rhythms in Action. Jazz Dance, Urban, Classical, and more for all ages.
translations.services.art.title: Art Workshop
translations.services.art.desc: Creative space to develop your skills in painting and drawing.
translations.services.health.title: Nutrition and Health
translations.services.health.desc: Nutritionist office available for members with preferential rates.
translations.services.university.title: Siglo 21 University
translations.services.university.desc: University Learning Center. Undergraduate and graduate degrees.
